resources.string: Affirmation
Back
For girls
For girls
These top 10 affirmations for women are aimed at increasing sexuality and accepting oneself. Some of them are based on the writings of Natalia Pravdina, who did a great job in studying this issue.
" 1. I am happy that I was born a woman. I radiate inner light and positive energy."
2. I love myself the way I am. I fully and unconditionally accept myself.
3. I am unique, beautiful, young, energetic and sexy.
4. I attract attention and attract the love of men.
5. I am constantly cultivating myself and getting better every minute.
6. I am wise, self-confident, and independent.
7. I get everything I want. The universe loves me. I deserve happiness.
8. I am responsible for my life, and I fully control it.
9. I am a self-sufficient and harmonious person. I have money, health and inspiration to realize all our plans.
10. I have everything I need: finance, health, beauty, love.
Speak these phrases regularly, and you will quickly notice positive changes.
For men
Regular repetition of these settings will help a man to pump over any vital sphere.
10. I am filled with energy every second, and become even better.
9. I am successful and energetic, so I want everything I want.
8. My body is powerful, strong, healthy and beautiful.
7. The universe helps and patronizes me: every day I get many opportunities for self-expression, and the realization of my life goals.
6. Nature has endowed me with sound health, keen mind and beauty.
5. I am healthy, strong, independent, successful and happy.
4. I am smart, handsome, successful and rich.
3. I provide my family with everything that they need, and I live in full prosperity.
2. Women like me: I attract their attention and love.
1. I am successful and self-sufficient.
These powerful affirmations are aimed at success, attracting money, and increasing self-esteem in men.
On affluence
To prosperity
For success
For good luck
For good health
For love
Slimming
On every day
For guys
To attract money and wealth
These affirmations are aimed at attracting money, financial well-being and material independence.
1. I deserve, and so I get everything I want.
2. I attract money to me, they love me, and they easily come into my life.
3. I can earn a lot more than required.
4. I provide all the benefits of myself and people close to me.
5. I am financially independent and control my income.
6. I attract luck, money loves me. I am a creative person with great prospects.
7. I do everything in time and perfectly organize the workflow.
8. I am a great worker and get a generous reward for it.
9. I am an excellent specialist in my field: I easily and happily do the work, and get a decent pay.
10. My life is filled with an abundance of resources, opportunities and finances.
Choose the most suitable setting for yourself, and pronounce it regularly.
BB
Affirmations for every day
These settings you can use the sutra to make your day even better.
1. This is my best day.
2. I am full of life energy.
3. I am overwhelmed with joy and love for people, and they reciprocate me.
4. Today I am irresistible: I look great, radiate positive, full of strength for grandiose accomplishments.
5. This day is productive, and brings me real pleasure.
6. I enjoy every minute, because it is unique.
7. I radiate happiness, joy and success.
8. I am grateful for every day of my life, because it is beautiful.
9. My intentions are pure. I abandon negative and destructive thoughts.
10. Love lives in my heart, I forgive all insults and is set for success and prosperity.
Take advantage of these powerful affirmations and make your life even better.
To attract love
We have collected the best positive attitudes, it is for these sources on the Internet the most positive feedback.
1. I am filled with inner light and love.
2. I sincerely love everyone around, and I reciprocate.
3. I am happy (a) in personal relationships and satisfied in the intimate sphere.
4. I have a great partner: he inspires, supports and understands me.
5. I am happy (a) every day to love and be loved (oops). I feel the joy of knowing myself and my half.
6. Love overwhelms me. I am open to new relationships and emotions.
7. I inspire and admire my partner. I am happy to be with this person.
8. I get pleasure from intimate relationships and communication with my soulmate. I deserve love, and radiate it with every cell of my body.
9. I gladly surrender to my partner and receive reciprocity from him. We admire each other.
10. I am immensely happy.
These settings are suitable for both men and women. Regularly pronounce these affirmations, and soon you will notice positive changes in your personal life and intimate sphere.
To attract good luck
To always bring you luck, use these affirmations.
1. Luck always follows me.
2. I am lucky in any undertaking. I am confident in the future.
3. I\'m lucky, because the universe loves me.
4. I get all the benefits that I need, as good luck accompanies me.
5. I attract success and good luck is always on my side.
6. I know exactly what to do to achieve success and prosperity in life.
7. I fully accept and understand myself. This allows me to be always successful and lucky.
8. I have been successful, and satisfied with it.
9. I am sure that luck will always follow me.
10. Success is my everyday state, which brings me joy.
These affirmations to attract good luck are suitable for both men and women.
For effective weight loss
To speed up the process of getting rid of extra pounds, use the following positive installation.
1. I am beautiful: I have a slim body and a perfect figure.
2. I lose weight quickly and easily, and I enjoy it.
3. My kilograms melt before my eyes, like snow in the warm spring sun.
4. I love and accept myself.
5. I am slim, fit, pumped up. I feel comfortable in my weight.
6. I easily lose weight, and am satisfied with my result.
7. I am perfect, and my weight is normal.
8. I eat little and feel full and satisfied.
9. I train effectively. Sports bring me real pleasure and burn a lot of calories.
10. I consistently lose weight. Every day my body looks better and better.
Starting the process of losing weight, select the appropriate settings for yourself, and tune in to a positive result.
To prosperity
These affirmations can be used every day to improve overall quality of life.
1. I am a successful, happy and realized person.
To attract success
Choose the most suitable setting for yourself, and pronounce it regularly.
10. I am calm, focused, deliberately make decisions and they are always right.
2. I just have enough. I control the situation, and in general my life. Easily and with pleasure I care about close people.
3. The universe loves me and provides a lot of opportunities every day.
4. I have everything under control: health, career, finances, personal life.
5. All my undertakings are successful, and dreams come true.
6. Everything I want is realized.
7. I can do everything. My heart is filled with joy and happiness.
8. I get everything I need and more. Every day is filled with joy and new impressions.
9. I always get lucky, God loves and cares for me.
If you want to be successful and achieve better results, the following installations will help you.
1. Today I have many opportunities to prove myself. Everything goes in the best way.
2. I always get lucky. Success accompanies me in any endeavors.
3. I get everything I want.
In the area of ​​attracting health into her life, Louise Hay made a great contribution.
4. I am successful, for God loves me.
5. I am strong mentally and physically.
6. Every breath fills me with confidence, and exhale carries away fears and doubts.
7. In me inexhaustible energy is boiling. I can do anything.
8. I attract only open and positive people to my life.
9. I am happy that I can control my life myself, and I am confident in the future.
10. I easily find a way out of any situation, think outside the box and creatively, generate the best solutions.
Judging by the opinions of people who used affirmations for success, after 7 days, they experienced significant changes in their lives.
To attract health
To preserve and strengthen your health, apply the following texts.
1. I am strong, strong in spirit and resilient.
2. My body is perfect.
3. I am full of health, joy and energy.
4. I take care of my body, and it makes me happy.
5. My organs work as one balanced and tuned mechanism. They do an excellent job with their functions.
6. I am young, strong, healthy, dexterous, fast, hardy. I have a healthy body and strong spirit.
7. I feel great and enjoy every moment.
8. I am grateful for my health and beauty.
9. I am aware and feel my power.
10. I enjoy life here and now, because I have everything I need.
